description.0: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

0.0: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>20%</cryo>.

1.0: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>24%</cryo>.

2.0: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>28%</cryo>.

3.0: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>32%</cryo>.

4.0: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>36%</cryo>.
